name: PunkStep(DATT 4300)
description:
Punkstep is a music game based on the pacific punk wave style. It uses a lot of clipart art to recreate the punk art style of the 1970s - 80s. The game uses the songs "Blame it on the Boogie" by The Jacksons and "London Calling" by The Clash. 

Listen to the music, follow the beat and enjoy the game. 

Controls: up/down/left/right key on keyboard 

Reference: 

Artworks:

 www.are.na/evan-collins-1522646491/pacific-new-wave-punk 

Video and Music:
